intro: ^, nice to see you again! How are you doing?"

s: ^I'm great, Mrs. Lee! How are you?
^Hi, Mrs. Lee! I’m doing good, and yourself?

Chat1: ^Mrslee?Smiling "I feel sleepy, but good! I’m looking for some meditation classes, maybe that would help me sleep better."

s: ^Oh, no are you okay Mrs. Lee?
^Meditation sounds like a good place to start. Are you up for a question?

Chat2: ^Mrslee?Smiling "I will be okay, don’t worry. Sometimes, it is hard to sleep."
^Mrslee?Smiling "Eddie, my grandson, suggested physical activity; I already take fitness classes and help with Lila's class."
^Mrslee?Smiling "Then he suggest I ask my friends. Lila showed me this list of classes that teach meditation and mindfulness exercises here at the Community Center!"
^Mrslee?Smiling "Eddie says maybe I need to make my brain tired too! If I cannot find an answer, I will ask for more help."

s: ^Eddie sounds like he knows what he's talking about.
^It sounds like you have this under control! Can I ask you something?

Chat3: ^Mrslee?Smiling "I know sometime people take medicine to help sleep but I want to find another way."
^Mrslee?Smiling "Sometime I just get up and watch television. Did you know I can watch Korean TV shows now on internet? Dr. Lee would have been so happy."

s: ^That sounds like a good way to cope! Can I ask you something?
^The Library is super busy and Rashad is looking for extra help.
^Do you know anyone looking for a job? Rashad needs someone who loves books.

Explain2: ^Mrslee_Day 1_Mrs. Lee can ask her friends if their grandchildren want to apply_Rashad1-3

Explain2.#: notification Mrslee_Day 1_Mrs. Lee can ask her friends if their grandchildren want to apply_Rashad1-3

Explain2: ^Mrslee?Neutral "Wow, I had no idea Rashad needs help like this. I know a lot of friends with grandchildren looking for work. What is the job?"

s: ^They're hiring a part-time worker in the young adult section.
^Rashad is looking for an assistant to help reshelve young adult books.

Suggestion1: ^Mrslee_Day 1_Rashad could reach out to those he has helped at the Library and ask them to spread the word about the open position_Rashad1-4

Suggestion1.#: notification Mrslee_Day 1_Rashad could reach out to those he has helped at the Library and ask them to spread the word about the open position_Rashad1-4

Suggestion1: ^Mrslee?Smiling "I met Rashad when he was the young adult librarian! Now he is hiring a new person to help in that department. I am so proud of him!"
^Mrslee?Smiling "I can spread the word to my friends at my next fitness class. We could post flyer on bulletin board in the Community Center."

s: ^That would be great! Thank you so much. Did you have any other questions?

Suggestion2: ^Mrslee?Smiling "Anything to help Rashad. When Eddie needed a summer job, Rashad helped him. Showed him how to use the internet to apply. Lots of jobs get posted online now."
^Mrslee?Smiling " Maybe we can also ask Lila to email people who attend fitness class. And her daycare parents! She knows everyone!"
^Mrslee?Smiling "I can share in my garden group. Some of them use online forums to talk about flowers. If one of them shares, maybe someone there likes books."

s: ^Perfect! You can include a link to Library's website where people can apply.

Goodbye: ^! I want to help Rashad because he does so much for the community."
^Mrslee?Smiling "I will pass the message along. See you soon."
